comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: The wife of Charles Michael Schwab Emma Eurana Dinkey married C. M. Schwab in 1883. She died on Jan. 23, 1939, in Manhattan at the age of 79 of heart disease. www.tnonline.com/2011/nov/05/local-boys-death-devastated-... www.bapl.org/lochist/comlife/people/mob/mob004-005.html

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See comment with link to NYT of 9/11/15 under www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/8540263580/ Schwab (and perhaps his wife) was at the St. Regis hotel around this time, perhaps to meet with the dismissed Austrian ambassador, who was suspected of plotting to "tie up munitions factories" including Schwab's.

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Thanks for the information!  We will update our record.
